Sentencas: This study focuses on the characterization of the structural and transport properties of the La2-xSrxCoO4 solid solution.
Titulo: High-temperature neutron diffraction study of La2-xSrxCoO4: Correlation between structure and transport properties

Sentencas: The wide temperature range investigated (30-750 degrees C) has been chosen in view of the potential applications of this class of materials both as catalysts and as cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: High-temperature neutron diffraction study of La2-xSrxCoO4: Correlation between structure and transport properties

Sentencas: The trend vs temperature of several structural parameters, as well as of the transport properties, for the La2-xSrxCoO4 series is complex and strongly dependent on composition.
Titulo: High-temperature neutron diffraction study of La2-xSrxCoO4: Correlation between structure and transport properties

Sentencas: A possible correlation between the structural and the transport properties, based on changes in the average oxidation and spin state of the Co ions, is proposed.
Titulo: High-temperature neutron diffraction study of La2-xSrxCoO4: Correlation between structure and transport properties
